original: 《 兵種升級 》不備不虞，不可以師。養兵千日，用兵一時。平日就應對全國士兵，精訓勤練、提升等級與應對能力；主動出征、或被動迎擊，才會有扭轉勝敗的足夠戰力！
text: "Upgrade of Arms" is not prepared for fear and cannot be divided. Raise soldiers for a thousand days and use them for a while. Dealing with soldiers from all over the country on weekdays, intensive training, leveling up and coping capabilities; active marching, or passive counterattack, will have sufficient combat power to reverse victory and defeat!
